name: Bolt Boi
description:
A species call the Hoverturtles has wiped out the entire Bean population... Except for one. That one is called Bolt Boi.

You must get your revenge and...

Blast the evil Hoverturtles with lightning bolts,

Defeat the colossal bosses,

and Buy epic upgrades!

-----------Hᴏᴡ Tᴏ Dᴏᴡɴʟᴏᴀᴅ & Iɴsᴛᴀʟʟ-----------

1. Once the Setup file is downloaded, open it. This dialog should pop up:

2. Click "More info" like so:

3. Click "Run anyway" like so:

4. Follow the setup instructions to install the game

5. Play and have fun!
